## Project Overview

LiveKit video calling backend with:

- FastAPI framework
- PostgreSQL database
- JWT authentication
- User management
- Room management
- LiveKit integration

## Current Status

✅ **FULLY OPERATIONAL** - The backend server is running on http://localhost:8000
✅ Database migrations applied
✅ All API endpoints available
✅ Interactive documentation at http://localhost:8000/docs
